title: Blessed Be Your Name
author: Matt and Beth Redman
presentation: v1 p c v2 p c b c ]

V1: When the sun's shining down on me
When the world's all as it should be
On the road marked with suffering
Though there's pain in the offering
V2: When the sun's shining down on me
When the world's all as it should be
On the road marked with suffering
Though there's pain in the offering
C1: Blessed be the name of the Lord
Blessed be the name of the Lord
B1: My heart will choose to say
P1: Every blessing You pour out I'll turn back to praise
When the darkness closes in Lord still I will say:
